sub_title: In Business To Save Our Home Planet
summary:
Hands-on executive with 20+ years of experience and a proven track record of delivering strong results, spanning diverse international (developed and emerging) markets and cultures (Europe, Asia, USA, Middle East and Africa). Successfully led teams through turnaround situations and (digital) transformations. Resourceful problem solver and inspiring, servant leader with natural curiosity and strong financial acumen.

I believe in the power of human potential and will bring this to life by creating a (holistically) safe environment in which every team mate can be her / his authentic self, enabling every team mate to grow, develop and perform. Jointly developing our vision, strategy and culture, and moving towards it as one, highly engaged and inspired team, delivering strong results, while driving a culture of diversity, inclusion and belonging.

Fluent in English. Conversant in French, Spanish, and German. Happily married to Adeline and proud father of Amelie, Boaz, and Elias. Enjoying sports, friendships, reading and cooking.

Career Highlights:
* Leads $1.5B EMEA East region encompassing Europe, Middle East, and Africa rebuilding and reengaging teams impacted by global reorganization. Integrated Nike Africa team, systems, and practices within 3 months without business disruption. Realized 15+% growth CAGR (well ahead of EMEA & Global) while improving EBITDA with more than 1200 bpts
* Served as EMEA project lead for global reorganization aligning functions, business units, and global counterparts. Delivered significant wage base savings and aligned EMEA within Global HQ vision.
* Directed turnaround of autocratically managed organization in Nike Turkey. Increased employee empowerment and enablement to realize vision and strategy. Doubled business in 4 years, more than double EBITDA, and secured firm position as #1 brand in Turkey up from #2. Became top 3 Best Place to Work in Turkey.

Specialties:  
Leadership & Team Building • Best in Class Consumer Value • Bottom & Top Line Growth • New Business Development • Multi-site Operations Management • Profit Margin Improvement • Organizational Transformation • Digital Transformation • Performance Measurement

education.field_of_study: Unleasing Human Potential through Energy Management
Theory U, a social technology for helping to bring about profound innovation and change.
English, Chemistry, Match, Physics, Economics, Biology

contributors.headline: In Business To Save Our Home Planet

profile_positions.title: Member of the Board of Advisors

profile_positions.description: Various guest lectures, for both bachelor and master students, focusing on Strategy, Sustainability, Leadership and Innovation
profile_positions.title: Guest Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
Conceptualize and develop strategic vision for EMEA East with 100+ countries and 1.6B consumers including strategy and operating plan with full P&L accountability including foreign exchange, tax, duties, (3rd party) warehouse, and wholesale and retail business spanning 60+ owned stores and Nike.com. Manage 15 direct and 1,500 indirect reports building an inclusive and empowering culture, growing key capabilities around Digital, Leadership, Consumer Understanding, and Innovation.

Selected Skills:
* EMEA East Operations Development
* Full P&L Accountability
* Taxation, Duties, & Foreign Exchange
* Warehouse & Wholesale Management
* Retail Operations Growth & Profitability
* Inclusive & Empowering Culture
* Digital & Website Promotion
* Market Penetration & Growth
* Profit Improvement & Top Line Growth
* Operations & Digital Transformations
* Organizational Restructuring & Turnaround
* Leadership Team Development
* Continuous Process Improvement
* Vision & Strategy Development

Additional assignments

EMEA executive sponsor for the Black Employee Network, establishing dialogue between the network and the organization. Developed & supported execution of holistic strategy to address inequality and under representation in Nike EMEA.

Lead EMEA “Social Purpose” project team tasked to redefine Nike’s commitment to social challenges and integrate it in the business strategy. Realized strong integration across 3 key areas (Community Impact, D&I and Sustainability), currently reflected in EMEA overall strategy, performance appraisals and successfully executed.
profile_positions.title: VP/GM EMEA East (Eastern Europe, Middle East & Africa)

profile_positions.description:
Transformed 50+ countries, marketplace towards digitally led marketplace, through bold vision with 20 direct reports and 350+ team members. Delivered seasonal and annual sales plan for 10 owned Nike countries with 40+ distributors, 6K+ retail outlets, and 1,800 accounts generating $1.5B in sales. Elevated retail consumer experiences and led digital market penetration.

Selected Skills:
* Organizational Transformation & Market Penetration
* Digital Marketplace Development & Expansion
* Vision & Strategy Development
* Multi-country Seasonal & Annual Sales Growth
* Distributor, Retail Outlet, & Account  Management
* Retail Consumer Experience Optimization
* Budget Control & Business Development / Growth
* Digital Marketplace Transformations
* Strategic Partnership Development
* Regional Crisis Management 
* Leadership & Team Building
* Full Lifecycle Project Management

Additional Assignment: 
EMEA project leader “Consumer Direct Offense” (part of global taskforce). Led strategic project realigning EMEA organization with “Consumer Direct” initiative delivering 4% Opex savings. Directed EMEA leadership team, HR teams and PMO organization and minimized disruptions with team of 50.
profile_positions.title: VP of Sales, Central & Eastern Europe and Middle East

profile_positions.description:
Developed and drove compelling marketplace vision and strategy within $1.5B category across all regions. Transformed and elevated customer experience at retail developing new, premium retail formats. Accelerated Nike.com as destination for basketball consumers driving assortments and allocations.

Selected Skills:
* Visioning & Category Strategy Development
* Market Penetration & Global Sales Growth
* Customer Experience Management & Culture Development
* Premium Retail Operations Design & Development
* Consumer Product Assortment & Allocations
profile_positions.title: VP of Sales, Global Basketball

Oversaw 3rd party warehouse, foreign exchange, and tax functions.

Initiator and passionate supporter of "Girl Effect Turkey" which aims to enable 1,000 girls by 2017 to unleash their potential through education www.girleffect.org

Led seasonal go-to-market process including World Cup 2010 participation and brand positioning.

volunteer_experiences.description: Participated in the IICS Financial Committee to drive, amongst others :1) sound financial planning, 2) effective and cost reducing supplier negotiations

Initiated and led the (Nike) Turkey "Girl Effect" initiative, aiming to unleash the potential of underprivileged Girls in Turkey through education. www.girleffect.org 
- Established team & strategy in Nike Turkey organization
- Developed partnership with local NGO: CYDD
- Raised funds in excess of $ 1.5mio to support over 500 girls (and working towards 1,000 Girls!)
- Established & enjoyed working with an incredible and passionate team to deliver all of the above
